item.description:
Our annual Columbus Day lunch is an SSDOMG tradition.

This year, in our search for new culinary horizons, we've trained our spyglass on Dedham, where the homey Fisherman's Restaurant serves three meals a day, seven days a week.

The emphases here are on seafood, friendliness and good value - not necessarily in that order. This is a family-owned restaurant that serves, by all accounts, family-sized portions. The menu lists their "Famous Fish & Chips" at $7.95, which nets you a pile of flaky, golden-brown goodness; and one reviewer on Yelp was so impressed by their plate-filling $4.99 breakfast special that she went to the trouble of photographing it.

Please join us this Monday, October 8th, as we sail up Route 128 and drop anchor in search of culinary companionship and preponderous piscine portions.

Special Note: Fisherman's restaurant doesn't take reservations. We're going toward the end of the usual lunch hour in hopes of avoiding the worst of the lunchtime rush, but please don't be in a hurry if you join us.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Fisherman's Restaurant
Monday, October 8th, 2012 @ 12:45 PM 
870 East St. 
Dedham, MA
(781) 326-0412
Website: Fisherman's Restaurant
What they're saying on Yelp

Organizers: Alison & Mike

Min/Max: None at this time.

Guests: Yes. Up to two per member.

Price Range: Prices here are on the modest side, with portions reputedly large. Have a look at the online menu, which tops out with a seafood platter for $17.95.

Cash Only Policy: Please bring cash! Paying for all of our meals in cash has been SSDOMG'S policy for over six years. It allows us to avoid the confusion of having the waitstaff run multiple credit card slips and generally helps to keep things simpler for everyone.

Event Fee: No Event Fee for current Annual Members. Other Members and Guests: $2.00

RSVP Deadline: Sunday, October 7th at 7:00 PM.

No-Show Policy on Membership Information Page: (Please click on the following link to be taken directly to the page.)

http://www.meetup.com/ssdomg/pages/Membership_Information/
item.how_to_find_us: They don't take reservations! Look for us at the front door or ask for the Meetup table!

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Reel in Lunch on Columbus Day!
